What is Graduate Guru?


Graduate Guru was established with a purpose to make education available to all the students across a spectrum of regions and streams anywhere, anytime at the tip of their fingers. We wish to create a concept of coaching at your homes.

We envision graduate guru to be an online platform where students from different regions, universities, colleges and streams can find content to revise their concepts without having to go to any other institute other than the college.

Know about us in 60 seconds

Learning at Graduate Guru

Excellent and Experienced Teachers

Graduate Guru provides highly educated and profound professionals from across the entire country from different universities. These professionals have great experience and exposure to their subjects.

Easy Access

The only requirement is a stable internet connection & an electronic device such as smartphones, computers, laptops, or tablets to learn from our services. It is easily accessible at any time and anywhere.

Live Doubt Solving Sessions

For better understanding for the students, Graduate Guru conducts a live doubt solving sessions in which there is an interaction between the teacher and the students. This enables the students to clear all their queries.

Adequate information

The information provided by Graduate Guru for each course gives them exposure for their academics as well as their career. It helps the students to practically imply the knowledge they have acquired.

Simplified learning experience

Graduate Guru provides learning through the audiovisual medium in which it creates a better and clearer understanding for the students. The method of learning is very simple and direct.

Lowest Price

The prices offered for every course is highly reasonable which is worth the service provided by us. It also motivates students to purchase more courses and learn for the benefits. It creates a sense of value.

Download

Graduate Guru envisions to be an online platform now students can take classes anywhere anytime using our app. Download now!
